modelDesc.tiny: Fast text output, average transcription quality.
modelDesc.base: Fast text output, average transcription quality.

modelDesc.medium: Slow text output, best transcription quality.
modelDesc.large: Slow text output, best transcription quality.
modelDesc.largeTurbo: With little loss of accuracy, the transfer speed is greatly improved

deleteModelDesc: After deletion, if you need to use the model again, you need to re-download.
secondStep: Second Step, Choose a model to download
pathConfigDesc: If you're unsure about the configuration, keep the default settings.
pathConfigDemo:
Filename configuration supports ${fileName} ${sourceLanguage}, ${targetLanguage}, ${model}, ${translateProvider} as variables

${fileName} represents the file name of the current processed file

${sourceLanguage} represents the source language of the video configured

${targetLanguage} represents the target language of the translation configured

${model} represents the whisper model configured

${translateProvider} represents the configured translation service name

For example, if a video file is named demo.mp4, the source language is English, the translation language is Chinese, and the path configuration is ${fileName}.${targetLanguage}

Then the generated subtitle file name is: demo.zh.srt
Error: missingKeyOrSecret: Please configure API KEY and API SECRET
updateReadyDesc: New version {version} has been downloaded and is ready to install.
newVersionDesc: New version {version} is available. Do you want to download it now?
downloadingUpdateDesc: Downloading version {version}. You will be prompted to install when complete.
